snippet.title: Smurfs' Village - iPhone & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Want to receive regular updates on free iPhone / iPad / iPod Game of the Day? Get started with the following official profiles of iGamesView.

Web: http://www.igamesview.com/ (One stop gaming portal; created for gamers and developers)
Like us on Fb: http://www.facebook.com/igamesview (Real time engagement)
Twitter @ iGamesView: http://twitter.com/iGamesView (Updates daily)
You tube channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/iGamesView (25-50 Videos are uploaded daily)
Follow Us on Google Plus: iGamesView

***************************************************************************
Game developers, who wish to promote quality games through our official channels, can directly send us their videos/promo codes etc. at info@igamesview.com

Smurfs' Village

http://goo.gl/WGjlu

Category :  "Entertainment", "Family", "Adventure"

Features:
- Creativity is your only limit, build a complete Smurfs' village from scratch
- Play with your favorite Smurfs including Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Lazy Smurf, Baby Smurf, Handy Smurf and Jokey Smurf
- Purchase Smurfberries via in-app purchase to speed up the growth of your crops and village!
- Play mini games like Greedy Smurf's Baking Game, Papa Smurf's Potion Mixing Game,Painter Smurf's Painting Game, Lazy Smurf's Fishin' Game and a new free Handy Smurf minigame and unlock additional bonuses
- Connect with friends through Facebook and Game Center and send gifts to your friends' villages
- Play offline... manage your village anytime without having to connect to the internet. 
- Retina display graphics
